content.prompt: The trend in the population percent increase from 1790 to 1800 most likely indicates which of the following?

choices.label: The rapid movement of migrants to newly settled states such as Kentucky and Tennessee
The increased arrival of indentured servants in established areas in Virginia and Maryland
The restriction of the international slave trade to North and South Carolina
The growth of new industrial cities in Georgia

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
